resources.string: Talk is a personal tool that helps you keep track of your mental health
Use the journal to write more detailed information about how you\'re feeling
Use the graph to view your mood history
Get suggested articles and videos that can help you improve your mood
Track your movement and app usage to better understand your moods
Please read the terms and conditions before you use the app
Self-care is how you take your power back
Daily affirmations are very powerful tool to be energize and build good mental health
Graph will track your mood and show your mood history
use this to describe your feeling,your priorities for the day at morning and at the and of the day write about your day.
Please read the terms and conditions
